body:
Hellooo.

The server's closing, I thought it would be fun to make a list of the top 10 people to have different stats. So, I've made exactly that, on this ResourcePile site: https://mcresourcepile.github.io/stats/avicus/miscellaneous

I want to add some more stats, so if you have any ideas, leave a comment. I think I'll do stuff like most kills and objectives on a separate page, but yea if you have any ideas at all, they'll probably be added to either of the two pages.

Here's where I need your help. These stats are for stuff that for the most part, cannot be found on the stats page. So if you know who has a pretty decent stat for any of the following categories, comment below!
  • Servers joined
  • Time online
  • Credits
  • Friends added
  • Forum posts (counted by the page numbers on a person's profile)
  • Top rated maps (according to the website's map pages)
Also, if you have any interesting facts, I'm down for including those. They can be random things, but they should have some sort of relevance to Avicus and be interesting enough (also make sure they're true!)
body_tagged:
